messages.msgSnippet: From Yahoo -- Date: 8/11/2008 4:16:57 PM To: moderatorcentral@yahoogroups.com Subject: [moderatorcentral] Delays with Groups Mail Processing We are currently
messages.messageBody:
From Yahoo --

Date: 8/11/2008 4:16:57 PM
To: moderatorcentral@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [moderatorcentral] Delays with Groups Mail Processing

We are currently experiencing Groups mail processing delays. We are
working to isolate the cause of this issue and will post updates as we
make progress.

As always, we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause
your Groups.

Thank you,
Jami
Groups Community Manager


On Aug 11, 2008, at 1:43 PM, kbcdlovejo@... wrote:

> From: polykowholsteins <polykowholsteins@...>
>
>
> is yahoo having a problem today? I don't see any posts since this
> morning ??

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] test
messages.msgSnippet: We are also having a gorgeous day here in MN but I have not managed to leave the farm. I had to go with the flow with my kids leading the way. MD was playing
messages.messageBody:
We are also having a gorgeous day here in MN but I have not managed to leave the farm.
I had to go with the flow with my kids leading the way.
MD was playing Roblox and communicating with  a Roblox friend \
so I needed to come in to read and spell for him.
It is amazing how he is learning to read and write by playing games
specially Roblox where he can "talk" to others.
Gigi left with dad to run errands and came home a little before one only to sleep for a couple of hours.
She usually does not take a nap until later in the afternoon so I was planning to go to the pool.
So I am kind hanging around the house "trying" to clean and organize.
 
Alex Polikowsky
http://polykow.blogspot.com/
 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingmn/

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: polykowholsteins <polykowholsteins@...>


is yahoo having a problem today? I don't see any posts since this
morning ??

-=-=-=-

I had some trouble a week or two ago.

But maybe everyone's out enjoying this absolutely fabulous, GORGEOUS
day!

Or are some of you NOT in picturesque Black Mountain NC? <g>

On my way into town to shop a bit and to sit down at my favorite German
restaurant for an early supper of Wurst, Kartoffeln, und Bier. <G>



~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
